name: Forgotten Shards
description:
"Forgotten Shards" is an action RPG game. It is heavily based on exploration, in classic zelda like style, where you need an item or ability to enter a certain area. But that is not the only thing that will block your path, you will find puzzles that need to be solved in order to proceed or discover secret. Yes, you can count on secrets as well. On the other hand there is combat which is inspired by soulslike games so you can expect great amount of rolling around, tough enemies, and a bit more missed parries than you would like to. 


You came here to make a wish, but you forgot what were you wishing for and you have no idea who did you ask and how powerful he is. Now you are banished into forgotten realm and you need to find a way out. It wont be easy, but you are not the only one trapped here. There are others and not everyone will want to help yo on your journey.

The game takes place in the forgotten realm, a place for banished souls. The center of this world is abandoned stronghold, but this is not the only location you can visit. There is much more in this small world. You can expect at least four different locations, each of them will provide you with unique experience and their own secrets to discover.

Demo notice:

This demo is basically a vertical slice of game core features and it is not part of the game’s story. 

Any kind of feedback is highly appreciated!
